entries.content: Starting logger cleanup task for src\ext\modules\UserConversationHistory. Moti wants to remove console.logs and logger statements that are overloading the system. First, exploring the folder structure.

Found 70 logger/console.log statements across 24 files in UserConversationHistory module. Breaking down by category: Event listeners (UserMessageListener, StreamingAssistantListener, BatchAssistantListener, EventCoordinator), Message processing (MessagePairSaver, AssistantMessageProcessor, UserMessageBuffer, MessageProcessingCoordinator), Session management (SessionFactory, SessionCrudHandler, SessionQueryHandler, SessionDeleteHandler), Storage operations (SessionSaver, SessionLoader, SessionDeleter, SessionScanner), Filesystem ops (FileWriter, FileReader, FileDeleter), Orchestrator (UserConversationHistoryOrchestrator), UI integration (HistoryDataProvider).

Logger cleanup completed for UserConversationHistory module. Removed 51 noise logs (console.log, logger.info, logger.debug, most logger.warn), kept 19 critical logs (15 logger.error for failures, 4 logger.warn for data validation issues). Final state: 25 total logger statements remaining (all critical). Removed logs from: HistoryDataProvider (7), UserConversationHistoryOrchestrator (3), Event Listeners (10), Message Processing (12), Session Management (7), Storage Operations (8), Filesystem (4).
